name: The Wild Robot
description: An intelligent robot finds herself alone on an island and must learn to survive in the wilderness.

name: Kabhi Khushi Kabhi Gham
description: A wealthy family faces turmoil when their adopted son marries against their wishes.

name: Swades
description: An NRI returns to India and reconnects with his roots while trying to improve rural life.

name: Dil Se
description: A radio journalist falls for a mysterious woman with a secret past.

name: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
description: Two college friends reunite years later, rekindling old feelings and memories.

name: Sikandar
description: An upcoming political action drama set in Punjab.

name: Naadaniyaan
description: A light-hearted sitcom about a quirky family and their humorous misadventures.

name: Fateh
description: Fateh is an upcoming action-thriller film featuring cybercrime themes.

name: Manjummel Boys
description: A group of friends takes on a daring rescue mission, inspired by a real story.

name: Aavesham
description: College students team up with a gangster to exact revenge, leading to chaos and laughs.

name: Deva
description: A rebellious cop uncovers a dark conspiracy while investigating a high-profile case.

name: Skyforce
description: India and Pakistan engage in airstrike warfare. As the conflict escalates, so does the risk of deadly consequences. Amid rising tensions, a group of individuals seek the truth behind the war

name: Badlapur
description: India and Pakistan engage in airstrike warfare. As the conflict escalates, so does the risk of deadly Raghu loses his wife and son when two bank robbers steal their car in a bid to run. Devastated by the incident, Raghu decides to take revenge on the culprits, Liak and Harman, for killing his family.

name: Highway
description: Veera, a young bride-to-be, is abducted by a local gangster, Mahabir, and his men a day prior to her wedding. Far from being terrified of her abductor, Veera discovers a new meaning to her life

name: Masaan
description: Veera, a young bride-to-be, is abducted by a local gangster, Mahabir, and his men a day prior to her wedding. Far from being terrified of her abductor, Veera discovers a new meaning to her life

name: October
description: Veera, a young bride-to-be, is abducted by a local gangster, Mahabir, and his men a day prior to her wedding. Far from being terrified of her abductor, Veera discovers a new meaning to her life

name: Hasee Toh Phasee
description: Nikhil is a struggling businessman who thinks he is in love with his girlfriend, Karishma, and wants to marry her. But he ends up falling in love with her smart, geeky and quirky sister, Meeta
